incidents.name: Email Channel of Twilio Verify Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify was degraded for 15 minutes between 15:41 and 15:56 Pacific Time on 03/27/2025. During this period, customers may have experienced increased latencies and 5xx errors when creating verifications with the Email channel of Twilio Verify. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Verify Email Channel. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Incorrect billing country set during MFA configuration during 1st account setups for non-US customers

incident_updates.body: The issue concerning the incorrect billing country being set during the Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) configuration for initial account setups for non-U.S. customers has been resolved. The service is now operating normally.

The issue where the incorrect billing country is set during MFA configuration for 1st account setups for non-US customers is now operating normally. Our engineers will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers are continuing to investigate the issue where the incorrect billing country is set during MFA configuration for 1st account setups for non-US customers and are working to identify a fix.

The suggested workaround is to select the correct billing country in the step that follows the MFA step during onboarding.

We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with Studio

incident_updates.body: Any customer who has Gather widget and had English (United States) as the gather_language were noticing higher number of 13331 errors. Studio was fully functional during that time and customer functionality was not impacted. Issue has been resolved.

Any customer who has Gather widget and had English (United States) as the gather_language were noticing higher number of 13331 errors. Studio was fully functional during that time and customer functionality was not impacted. Users should see fewer 13331 errors with the gather widget regardless of gather_language selected. We are monitoring to ensure that the service remains unimpacted.

Our engineering team has identified an issue with studio and is working on mitigating the issue. Any customers who have the Gather widget and who have "English (United States)" are impacted. 

Most existing customers have "en-US" or "en set", however because of a previous UI bug any new flows created or modified during Feb 20 2025 to March 12 2025 were defaulted to "English (United States)" as the gather_language and would be impacted. 

Engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as we have new information.
